message.content:
cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.HC, cs.CE, cs.CL 

The paper presents an approach to Intelligent Tutoring Systems that uses empirical estimation of learning progress and Multi-Arm Bandit techniques to efficiently manage the exploration/exploitation challenge of the optimization process. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Additionally, the paper evaluates the system in a scenario where schoolchildren learn how to decompose numbers while manipulating money, which suggests that the paper may also belong to the sub-categories of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC), Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science (cs.CE), and Computation and Language (cs.CL).
